lead_paragraph: Arsenal have signed Germany's 2014 World Cup-winning defender Shkodran Mustafi and Spanish striker Lucas Perez, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Arsenal Splash Out on Mustafi and Perez
headline.main: Arsenal Splash Out on Mustafi and Perez

snippet: Arsenal have signed Germany's 2014 World Cup-winning defender Shkodran Mustafi and Spanish striker Lucas Perez, the Premier League club said on Tuesday....
